Document.name: LoadFunction
Document.summary: Load a C++ friendly function from a global context, raise an exception if multiple functions are found under the same name. Function "<initialize>" should be the first to execute.
Document.param: The context to the evaluation environment.
Document.remarks: "<initialize>" must be the first function that is executed after an assembly is loaded. Its type is void().
Document.signature: template < typename TFunction > Func<TFunction> LoadFunction( Ptr<WfRuntimeGlobalContext> context, WString const & name );
